caption.p: Rainfall trends during the sowing-emergence ( a), emergence-squaring ( b), squaring-flowering ( c), flowering-boll opening ( d), and boll opening-harvest ( e) periods and the whole growing period ( f) of cotton across the North China Plain from 1981 to 2012. Green and red circles represent the trends of rainfall. Black pentagrams represent a significance level of 0.05. Maps were generated using ArcGIS 10.1 (ESRI Inc, Redlands, CA, USA, http://www.esri.com/).
